pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computes DNSLbetweenness, a Betweenness Measure that Includes Self-Loops // Computes a new measure, DNSL betweenness, via the creation of a new graph from an existing one, duplicating nodes with self-loops. This betweenness centrality does not drop this essential information. Implements Merelo Molinari (2024) doi:10.1007/s42001-023-00245-4.
